docs.lead_paragraph: A study of more than 1,000 sixth graders in Michigan found that those who regularly had the school lunch were 29 percent more likely to be obese than those who brought lunch from home.

headline.print_headline: CHILDHOOD: When the Cafeteria Line Leads to Tater Tots

docs.snippet: A study of more than 1,000 sixth graders in Michigan found that those who regularly had the school lunch were 29 percent more likely to be obese than those who brought lunch from home.
